description: This file defines a 'Results' page/component for a LightningJS-based quiz application. It displays the user's score and includes a button to restart the quiz. The component fetches state information from the router and handles navigation on button press.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Defines the reactive state variables for layout positioning, colors, labels, and score text.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Registers the Button component for use within this component.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Initializes the score display text based on router state.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up the button's onPress handler to navigate back to the main page.
